text.content:
This sword is Heavy

You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Fatigued]{Fatigued}.

Melee

Errant Aim

Reroll the attack roll, targeting the creature closest to the target (excluding yourself).

Ranged

Awkward Attack

You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} until the end of your next turn.

Unarmed

Bleeding Eyes

You take @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d6.success].

Spell
